        public User executeLogInQuery(String id,
                              String password)
                       throws SQLException
        * Executes an SQL query that yields a ResultSet with a user if the filled in fields match a id and password in the user table. Else returns an ResultSet Using a Prepared Statement. Prepared statements are used against SQL injection
        Parameters:
        id - the username from the user.
        password - the password that the user entered
        Returns:
        a ResultSet object (User)
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • executeInsertMatchQuery

        public void executeInsertMatchQuery(String matchedId,
                                    String foundRegistrationNr,
                                    String lostRegistrationNr,
                                    String employeeId,
                                    String dateMatched)
                             throws SQLException
        Parameters:
        matchedId - //generated id for the match itself PKey
        foundRegistrationNr - //id of the matched found luggage FKey
        lostRegistrationNr - //id of the matched lost luggage FKey
        employeeId - //id of the employee that confirmed the match
        dateMatched - //current date
        Throws:
        SQLException - because there will be a SQL query executed
